name: Spoolman
description: Keep track of your inventory of 3D-printer filament spools. Spoolman is a self-hosted web service designed to help you efficiently manage your 3D printer filament spools and monitor their usage.
longDescription: Keep track of your inventory of 3D-printer filament spools. Spoolman is a self-hosted web service designed to help you efficiently manage your 3D printer filament spools and monitor their usage.
